availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Susan Shelby Magoffin Gaither (Franklin co. resident, daughter of Gov. Beriah Magoffin)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of Beriah Magoffin and Anna Nelson Shelby Magoffin. Married to Nathan Gaither, Jr. in Franklin County, Kentucky, on September 25, 1861. Resident of Harrodsburg, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned twelve enslaved persons in Harrodsburg in 1850. Resident of Frankfort, Kentucky, in 1860. Household owned eleven enslaved persons in Frankfort in 1860. Resident of Columbia, Kentucky, in 1863.
